SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Brianna Ross’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for civically, socially, and politically engaged students who know how to advocate for change…”

– Ms. Brianna Ross, Social Studies Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/civil-social-political-students-advocate-change/
